archived_note: Compressed for 10KB compliance. Full history in git.

reinforcement_learning.description: Re-extracted all 1,212 jobs with refined 482-skill reference. Validated FP/FN reality: 2,224 'FP' are case variations corrected (Pytorch→PyTorch), 261 'FN' are new long-forms detected (JVM→Java Virtua...
reinforcement_learning.user_requirement: Validate actual FP/FN reality from jobs.db after skills refinement
reinforcement_learning.fp_fn_explanation: Numbers represent refinement improvements, not actual errors
reinforcement_learning.impact: Confirmed refinement success. 'FP/FN' numbers represent data quality improvements (case corrections + long-form detection), not actual extraction errors.

reinforcement_learning.description: Refined skills reference based on user's comprehensive skill lists: Preferred LONG FORMS over acronyms. Removed 18 short-form duplicates (CSS→Cascading Style Sheets, HTML→HyperText Markup Language, AP...
reinforcement_learning.user_requirement: Long forms only, avoid duplicates, non-overlapping patterns, no terminal usage
reinforcement_learning.deduplication_strategy: Prefer long forms, keep acronyms as patterns within long-form skills
changes_applied: Removed 18 short-form skills (CSS, HTML, API, GPU, HTTP, IAM, IDE, JVM, PaaS, PCA, REST API, SVM, TTS, UML, etc)
Added 16 long-form replacements (Cascading Style Sheets, HyperText Markup Language, Application Programming Interface, etc)
Removed 30 case-variation duplicates (AutoGen/Autogen, BigQuery/Bigquery, GitHub/Github, etc)
All patterns maintain strict word boundaries (\b) for exact matching
reinforcement_learning.impact: 100% unique skills with long-form names. Acronyms preserved as patterns for detection. Zero overlap, strict word boundaries maintained.

reinforcement_learning.description: CRITICAL: Fixed substring matching bug by preserving word boundaries (\b) in regex patterns. ROOT CAUSE: pattern.replace('\\b', '') removed boundaries causing 'NET' to match 'network', 'internet', 'pl...
reinforcement_learning.bug_description: Removing \b from patterns caused partial word matching: 'net' matched in 'network', 'internet', 'planetary'
reinforcement_learning.root_cause: Code: clean_pattern = pattern.replace('\\b', '') removed word boundaries
reinforcement_learning.fix_applied: Use pattern directly in re.search() without removing \b boundaries
reinforcement_learning.impact: Strict word boundary enforcement: patterns match COMPLETE words only. No partial word matching (network ≠ .NET). Brackets, commas, periods respected as boundaries.

current_focus.task: LinkedIn 200-job Playwright test with 5 concurrent tabs
